author: Michael Bürgi
title: Canadian indie Salt XC expands its U.S. presence with purchase of Craft & Commerce
description: Less than a year after buying Nectar First, an AI-driven specialist, Salt XC has expanded its full-service media offerings with the purchase of Craft and Commerce.
